name: r5-wallet
description: A dedicated GUI Desktop Wallet for R5 Network users.
author: R5 Labs

scripts.dev:electron: npm run transpile:electron && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.dist:gen64: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --x64
scripts.dist:arm: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --arm64
scripts.dist:mac: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --arm64
scripts.dist:win: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.dist:linux: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --x64

linux.synopsis: A GUI Wallet for the R5 Blockchain
linux.description: The R5 Desktop Wallet is a secure, fast, and user-friendly application to manage R5 Coins.
